cartoes.offer_description: When purchasing one of our customizable QR Code and NFC cards, we offer a card holder with neck strap.
cartoes.child_safety_description: Ideal for outdoor activities, Child Safety cards are designed to protect the little ones. These cards allow a quick response in case of loss or emergency. Through QR Code and NFC, access (Blood Type, Health Number, Regular Medication, Additional Contacts).
cartoes.autism_description: Designed with inclusion in mind, our Autism cards for people on the autism spectrum include identification, emergency contact, and through QR Code or NFC, it is possible to quickly access additional information that may be crucial in stressful or emergency situations (Blood Type, Health Number, Regular Medication, Additional Contacts, Medical Report).
cartoes.after_qr_nfc: After scanning the QR Code or using NFC
cartoes.business_description: Add technological professionalism with the Customizable Card, you can now also receive feedback outside the establishment, or even provide contact for a potential customer.

placas.title: Our Signs
placas.description: With a simple touch or scan, your customers instantly access reviews, menus, social media, or any link of your choice â€” fast, easy, and with no monthly fees.
placas.premium_description: Highlight your business with the Customizable Sign, the premium version of our signs, allowing you to customize the entire sign with icons that reflect your brand's style and identity.
placas.connect_hub_description: Take the first step in digitizing your business with the Connect Hub, ideal for businesses looking to centralize all networks into a single point of contact.
placas.superior_description: Highlight your business with the Duo Color, the superior version of our signs, allowing you to customize the circle color and background color to create a unique combination that reflects your brand's style and identity.
placas.classic_description: Take the first step in digitizing your business with the Ring Color, customize the circle color to match your space's environment and show a touch of visual identity.
